sysops.spec_tooltip: Supports second-level scheduling. Unlike standard cron, the first field is seconds (Quartz compatible), but the year field is not supported.

accessLog.clearConfirmContent: Clear all access logs? This action cannot be undone.

wol.offline_desc: Asset may not be fully started, please retry later

shell_assistant.title: Shell Assistant
shell_assistant.placeholder: Describe the shell command you need, e.g., find files larger than 100MB

account.access_token_once_tip: Token is shown only once. Please keep it safe.
account.client_cert_once_tip: The certificate can be downloaded only once. If lost, regenerate it.

login.wechat_work_error: WeCom login failed, please try again

account.otp_bind_sub_title: Multi-factor authentication — login identity verification, safer access control.
account.otp_unbind_title: Are you sure you want to disable MFA?
account.otp_unbind_subtitle: Disabling it may increase the risk of account compromise.
account.otp_description: Two-factor authentication (OTP) provides extra protection for your account. Even if your password is leaked, attackers cannot access your account without your mobile device.

otp_features.title: Features
otp_features.enhanced_security: Enhanced security: adds an extra security layer to login
otp_features.offline_access: Offline access: generate codes without network connection
otp_features.time_based: Time-based: codes refresh every 30 seconds for security
otp_features.widely_supported: Widely supported: compatible with mainstream authenticator apps

step1.title: Step 1: Install an authenticator app
step1.description: Install any of the following apps on your phone:

step2.title: Step 2: Scan the QR code
step2.description: Use the authenticator app to scan the QR code below, or enter the key manually

step3.title: Step 3: Enter the code
step3.description: Enter the 6-digit code shown in the authenticator app to complete binding

account.otp_manual_setup_desc: If you can't scan the QR code, enter this key manually in your authenticator app:
account.otp_scan_instruction: Please use the authenticator app to scan the QR code above
account.otp_verification_instruction: Please enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
account.otp_security_description: After binding, your account will be protected by MFA. Please keep your authenticator device safe.
account.otp_step2_description: Scan the QR code with the authenticator app
account.otp_step3_description: Enter the code to complete binding
account.passkey_delete_title: Are you sure you want to remove your passkey?
account.passkey_delete_content: Passkeys provide better protection for your account and assets; it's recommended to keep it.
account.no_mfa_title: Please bind a security authentication method
account.no_mfa_subtitle: You haven't bound any security method and cannot view sensitive data.
account.auth_type_passkey_desc: Authenticate with biometrics or security key
account.oidc_server_authorizations_desc: Manage third-party apps authorized to access your account
account.oidc_server_authorization_revoke_content: Are you sure you want to revoke {{clientId}}? It will no longer access your account info.

oidc_consent.title: Authorization Request
oidc_consent.subtitle: Please confirm the following authorization info
oidc_consent.request_access_desc: This app will be able to perform the following actions on your behalf
oidc_consent.warning: After authorization, {{clientId}} can access the info you selected. You can revoke at any time in account settings.

account.mfa_passkey_prompt: Please complete Passkey authentication in the browser popup

assets.alias_placeholder: Only letters, numbers, underscores or hyphens, and start with a letter
assets.alias_invalid: Alias must start with a letter and contain only letters, numbers, underscores or hyphens
assets.alias_tip: When directly connecting to SSH Server, the alias can be used as the target name.
assets.resize_method_extra: How the RDP server should be updated when the client display size changes.

resize_methods.display_update_desc: Use the RDP 8.1 "Display Update" channel to notify the server of display size changes
resize_methods.reconnect_desc: Automatically disconnect and reconnect with the new size when client display size changes

assets.rdp_drive_path_extra: If not selected, the operator's default storage will be used
assets.domain_tip: The domain used to access protected assets (e.g., www.example.com) must resolve to this system's IP.
assets.entrance_tip: Entry path is the page opened automatically on first access
assets.preserve_host_tip: Preserve the Host header as the original request host, instead of the proxy server's host.
assets.disable_access_log_tip: When enabled, access requests to this website will not be recorded in access logs
assets.custom_header_tip: You can add multiple headers in the format: Key: Value.
assets.import_asset_tip: When importing assets, account/password and key/passphrase are mutually exclusive; if both are provided, key/passphrase takes precedence.
assets.import_asset_error_title: Please check the import file; the following assets failed to import:
assets.public_tip: Restriction applies only to anonymous users.
assets.limit_ip_tip: Restrict users to access assets only from specified IPs. CIDR supported, e.g., 192.168.1.0/24. Dash ranges supported, e.g., 192.168.1.0-192.168.1.255. Multiple IPs separated by commas.
assets.limit_country_tip: Restrict anonymous access to specified countries; supports Chinese or English names.
assets.limit_province_tip: Restrict anonymous access to specified provinces/states; supports Chinese or English names.
assets.limit_city_tip: Restrict anonymous access to specified cities; supports Chinese or English names.
assets.limit_geo_input_tip: Press Enter to add a tag; you can add multiple.
assets.limit_password_tip: Access asset only with correct passcode.
assets.temp_allow_duration_tip: After clicking the button, the current IP is allowed for the duration.
assets.temp_allow_auto_renew_tip: When enabled, each request extends the validity.

certificates.self_signed_tip_title: Tip: You can replace the root certificate yourself; take effect after restart.
certificates.is_default_tooltip: Default certificate is used when no other certificate matches.
certificates.renew_confirm_content: The certificate will be re-issued and updated. Continue?

stats.no_data_desc: Logs will be displayed in realtime during certificate operations

dns_providers.remove_confirm_content: After removal, certificates cannot be requested

assets.disable_alive_check_extra: Frontend sends heartbeats to keep connection alive, and backend requests the target server to respond.
assets.disable_detect_os_extra: When asset logo is empty, the system auto-detects the OS and sets an appropriate logo.

wol.mac_addr_placeholder: Please enter MAC address, format: AA:BB:CC:DD:EE:FF
wol.wakeup_delay_tooltip: Time to wait after sending wake packet

security.mode_extra: Security mode for RDP connection, determines encryption and auth type.
security.ignore_cert_extra: Ignore server certificate even if invalid (e.g., self-signed).
security.cert_tofu_extra: Enable FreeRDP TOFU policy: trust unknown certificates on first use.
security.cert_fingerprints_extra: Comma-separated list of certificate fingerprints and hashes; server cert will be verified.
security.disable_auth_extra: Disable authentication during connection (does not affect login within remote desktop session).

modes.any_desc: Automatically choose based on client and server supported security protocols (default)
modes.nla_desc: Use TLS encryption; requires username and password
modes.nla_ext_desc: Same as NLA, but requires server to send additional "early user authorization result"
modes.tls_desc: RDP authentication and encryption via TLS, mainly for load balancer setups
modes.vmconnect_desc: Auto select security mode, limited to Hyper-V/VMConnect supported protocols
modes.rdp_desc: Legacy RDP encryption mode, typically for older Windows servers

website_response_modify.save_success_desc: HTTP response modification rules saved successfully
website_response_modify.match_path_tip: Path to match, e.g., /api/data (empty matches all paths)
website_response_modify.match_method_tip: HTTP method to match (empty matches all methods)
website_response_modify.match_status_tip: HTTP status code to match, e.g., 200, 404 (0 matches all status codes)
website_response_modify.remove_headers_tip: Response headers to remove (header names only)
website_response_modify.use_regex_tip: Whether to treat search text as a regex

gateways.free_limit_tip: Free edition supports only 1 security gateway. Upgrade for more.
gateways.install_windows_service_tip: After registration, it will be installed as a Windows service and started automatically
gateways.install_system_service_tip: After registration, it will be installed as a system service and started automatically

password.too_short: Password length cannot be less than
password.too_simple: Password must contain at least {{count}} of uppercase, lowercase, numbers, special characters

login_lock.tip: When enabled, continuous failures within the specified time will lock account or IP. To lift the restriction, please visit

sshd.tip: When enabled, a local port will be listened on. You can use an SSH client to access authorized SSH assets with the same account and password as this system.
sshd.private_key_modal_tip: Generate or paste your private key.

mail.tip: You need to enable email before sending test email.
mail.title: Email Subject

ldap.tip: When enabled, LDAP will be used for user authentication.

user_search.size_limit_tooltip: LDAP max search results, 0 means unlimited.

wechat_work.tip: When enabled, users can log in via WeCom QR code.

oidc.tip: When enabled, users can log in with an OIDC identity provider.
oidc.scopes_placeholder: Please enter scopes, separated by spaces, e.g., openid profile email

backup.tip: When restoring data, if users with the same login account exist, the original system data will be kept. Since passwords are irreversible, restored account passwords will be random.

restricted.label: Restricted Access
restricted.content: Current license doesn't support this feature.

upgrade.title: Upgrade System
upgrade.content: Are you sure you want to upgrade the system version?

llm.title: LLM Settings
llm.shell_prompt_default:
You are an IT operations assistant responsible for converting user requests directly into Linux shell commands.

Rules:

1. **Output commands only**, no explanations, no Markdown, no extra text.
2. If multiple ways exist, output the most common and safe one.
3. Use Bash syntax compatible with common distros like Ubuntu/Debian/CentOS.
4. For dangerous operations (e.g., `rm -rf /`, `:(){:|:&};:`), output: "This operation is risky, please proceed with caution".
5. If the user input is incomplete, auto-complete to the most common reasonable full command.
llm.audit_prompt_default:
You are a professional system audit assistant. Please analyze the provided logs, operation records, or system information and give professional audit advice.

Analysis focus:
1. Security risk identification
2. Abnormal behavior detection
3. Compliance checks
4. Performance issue analysis
5. Recommendations and improvements

Please analyze the information comprehensively and provide a detailed audit report.

oidc_server.description: Configure OIDC Server to make Next Terminal an OpenID Connect provider, allowing other apps to use this system for SSO.
oidc_server.manage_tip_prefix: After enabling, you can manage apps in "
oidc_server.issuer_tooltip: OIDC issuer identifier, usually Next Terminal access address + /api
oidc_server.access_token_ttl_tooltip: Access Token validity, default 3600 seconds (1 hour)
oidc_server.refresh_token_ttl_tooltip: Refresh Token validity, default 604800 seconds (7 days)
oidc_server.id_token_ttl_tooltip: ID Token validity, default 3600 seconds (1 hour)
oidc_server.auth_code_ttl_tooltip: Authorization code validity, default 600 seconds (10 minutes)

network.trust_ip_tip: Configure trusted proxy IPs, CIDR supported

work_order.reason_placeholder: Please enter reason for executing this SQL

proxy.block_dml_tip: When enabled, only read-only SQL is allowed.
proxy.tip: Enable proxy to allow client connections and execute SQL.
